alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Washington County through 630 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Millry, or 12 miles north of Chatom. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
